name: The Sink: A Simulator
description:
Welcome and thank you for playing my first game  "The Sink: A Simulator".  Feedback appreciated!

Controls:

Use num keys 1-4 to change color of water

Use O or F keys to turn faucet on or off.

That's it!

Notes: Game not loading up? Give it a few more seconds!

Sounds:  Water running sound effect from free sounds library.

                      Song: Dogman by Shaolin Dub
